tool.name: StreamEntryExits

param.name: Output_folder
param.dialogReference: Specify the path for the output folder.

param.name: Study_area_mask
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the input study area mask shapefile.

param.name: Stream_network
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the input stream network shapefile. Note that your stream network must have the fields 'FROM_NODE' and 'TO_NODE' populated.

param.name: Flow_accumulation_raster
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the input flow accumulation raster.

tool.summary: This tool uses a mask of the study area, a stream network, and a flow accumulation raster to produce a map showing the points where streams enter and exit the study area. It also uses this information to identify the main outlet point of the catchment or study area.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool uses a mask of the study area, a stream network, and a flow accumulation raster to produce a map showing the points where streams enter and exit the study area. It also uses this information to identify the main outlet point of the catchment or study area.
